- Week 6: Broncos lose to Kansas City Chiefs (3-3).
- Week 7: Broncos lose to Oakland Raiders (3-4).
- Week 8: Broncos lose to Cincinnati Bengals (3-5).
- Week 9: Broncos win against San Diego Chargers (4-5).
- Week 10: Broncos lose to Atlanta Falcons (4-6) and have no opponents before.
- Week 11: Broncos beat San Diego Chargers (5-6) and have no opponents before.
- Week 12: Broncos lose to Oakland Raiders (5-7).

There is a period of two games without consecutive losses starting from week 10 with wins, followed by loss.

However, it seems the data we are provided doesn't match exactly with 1975, because the date ranges from September 21 to December 20.
